courses.name: General English (Beginner to Upper Intermediat)
courses.durationDetail: Minimum 12 weeks (10 wks Tuition + 2 wks Break)
courses.tuitionDetail: 50% OFF 1 BLOCK OF ELICOS GENERAL ENGLISH when packaged with any VET course OR with purchase of 4 ELICOS Blocks ; 1 ELICOS Block = 12 weeks (10 wks Tuition + 2 wks Break) ($220 per week if enrolled for less than 12 weeks)
